solution_line_template: The second day he visited {houses_day1}*{multiplier_twice}=<<{houses_day1}*{multiplier_twice}={houses_day2}>>{houses_day2} houses
So he sold things at {houses_day2}*{sale_rate_day2}=<<{houses_day2}*{sale_rate_day2}={houses_sold_day2}>>{houses_sold_day2} houses
So in total he sold things at {houses_sold_day1}+{houses_sold_day2}=<<{houses_sold_day1}+{houses_sold_day2}={total_houses_sold}>>{total_houses_sold} houses
